definition: to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Will a surge of American soldiers turn the tide in Afghanistan?
sentences.chinese: 向阿富汗增派美軍是否能扭轉那裏的敗局？

sentences.english: For Chiang's position in Manchuria was irretrievable.
sentences.chinese: 蔣在滿洲的敗局明明是無法挽回的。

sentences.english: The longer we delay, the more extreme the steps that will have to be taken.
sentences.chinese: 拖得越久，挽救敗局的措施就將越極端。
